name: Saccharine Pale (Poast)
description:

!!!DISCLAIMER!!! !!!DISCLAIMER!!! !!!DISCLAIMER!!!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 Saccharine Pale is a "Nemesis Dueler" first-person action game with a DEEPLY robust, intuitive, and revolutionary "SLASH 'N PARRY" combat system!

The central gameplay loop of Saccharine Pale places emphasis on:

- Giving Players Unparalleled Creative Expression and Freedom of Play through Emergent Combat Mechanics!

- Level Design that Incorporates a Variety of Surface Materials that affect Friction, Collision Damage, Stealth, and even CROSSBOW RICOCHETS!

- High Tension Duels against The Himantovulpes and its MANY Formidable Evolutionary Phases, complete with:

               - Powerful Arcane Mutations

               - Adaptive Intelligence

               - Retreating to Increasingly Advantageous and Complex Habitats

               - Ever-Improving Martial Skills

...and above all, BEING FUN!

Join the Discord to stay updated on future versions, or if you just wanna pop in and say hi!
